body.p: While the 2010 Hedge Accounting Exposure Draft was open for public comment, the Board issued IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement. As a consequence of issuing that IFRS, the Board moved the fair value disclosures in IFRS 7 to IFRS 13. To improve the usefulness of the hedge accounting disclosures, the Board decided to require entities to use the same level of aggregation or disaggregation it used for other IFRS 7 or IFRS 13 disclosures related to the same underlying information.
